00026 image_classification_node::image_classification_node(void) : children_number(2)
00027 {
00028   depth = -1;
00029   class_number = -1;
00030   parent = 0;
00031   P = 0;
00032 
00033   leaf = true;
00034 
00035   examples = 0;
00036 }
00037 
00038 image_classification_node::image_classification_node(int _depth, int _class_number, image_classification_node * _parent) : children_number(2)
00039 {
00040   depth = _depth;
00041   class_number = _class_number;
00042   parent = _parent;
00043 
00044   leaf = true;
00045 
00046   examples = 0;
00047   P = 0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 image_classification_node::~image_classification_node(void)
00051 {
00052   if (examples) delete examples;
00053   if (P) delete[] P;
00054 
00055   if (!is_leaf())
00056     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00057       delete children[i];
00058 }
00059 
00060 void image_classification_node::add_example(image_class_example * pv)
00061 {
00062   if (examples == 0)
00063     examples = new vector<image_class_example *>;
00064   examples->push_back(pv);
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool image_classification_node::should_stop_recursion(void)
00068 {
00069   if (nb_examples() < 2)
00070     return true;
00071 
00072   // Return true if only one class is present in the examples:
00073   int represented_class_number = 0;
00074   int first_represented_class_index = 0;
00075   for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator it = examples->begin(); it < examples->end(); it++)
00076   {
00077     if (represented_class_number == 0)
00078     {
00079       first_represented_class_index = (*it)->class_index;
00080       represented_class_number = 1;
00081     }
00082     else
00083       if ((*it)->class_index != first_represented_class_index)
00084         return false;
00085   }
00086 
00087   return true;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void image_classification_node::premature_end_recursion(void)
00091 {
00092   P = new float[class_number];
00093 
00094   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00095     P[i] = 0.;
00096 
00097   if (nb_examples() > 0)
00098   {
00099     for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator it = examples->begin(); it < examples->end(); it++)
00100       P[(*it)->class_index]++;
00101 
00102     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00103       P[i] /= examples->size();
00104   }
00105 
00106   best_class = 0;
00107   float best_p = P[best_class];
00108   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00109   {
00110     if (P[i] > best_p)
00111     {
00112       best_p = P[i];
00113       best_class = i;
00114     }
00115   }
00116 }
00117 
00118 void image_classification_node::expand(void)
00119 {
00120   assert(children_number <= 3);
00121 
00122   for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00123     children[i] = new image_classification_node(depth + 1, class_number, this);
00124 
00125   if (examples != 0)
00126   {
00127     for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator it = examples->begin(); it < examples->end(); it++)
00128       for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00129         if (fall_in_child(*it, i))
00130           children[i]->add_example(*it);
00131 
00132     delete examples;
00133 
00134     examples = 0;
00135   }
00136 }
00137 
00138 bool image_classification_node::fall_in_child(image_class_example * pv, int child_index)
00139 {
00140   int dp = dot_product(pv);
00141 
00142   if (dp <= 0 && child_index == 0) return true;
00143   if (dp >  0 && child_index == 1) return true;
00144 
00145   return false;
00146 }
00147 
00148 int image_classification_node::dot_product(image_class_example * pv) const
00149 {
00150   unsigned char * I = mcvRow(pv->preprocessed, 0, unsigned char);
00151   return (int)I[d1] - (int)I[d2];
00152 }
00153 
00154 int image_classification_node::child_index(image_class_example * pv) const
00155 {
00156   int dp = dot_product(pv);
00157   if (dp <= 0) return 0; 
00158 
00159   return 1;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void image_classification_node::end_recursion(void)
00163 {
00164   for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00165   {
00166     children[i] = new image_classification_node(depth + 1, class_number, this);
00167     children[i]->P = new float[class_number];
00168     for(int j = 0; j < class_number; j++)
00169       children[i]->P[j] = 0.;
00170   }
00171 }
00172 
00173 void image_classification_node::change_class_number_and_reset_probabilities(int new_class_number)
00174 {
00175   class_number = new_class_number;
00176 
00177   if (is_leaf())
00178   {
00179     delete [] P;
00180 
00181     P = new float[class_number];
00182 
00183     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00184       P[i] = 0.;
00185   }
00186   else
00187     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00188       children[i]->change_class_number_and_reset_probabilities(new_class_number);
00189 }
00190 
00191 void image_classification_node::reestimate_probabilities_recursive(float * weights)
00192 {
00193   if (is_leaf())
00194   {
00195     if (weights == 0)
00196     {
00197       probability_sum = 0;
00198 
00199       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00200         probability_sum += P[i];
00201 
00202       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00203         P[i] = (probability_sum > 0) ? P[i] / probability_sum : 0.f;
00204     }
00205     else
00206     {
00207       probability_sum = 0;
00208 
00209       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00210         probability_sum += weights[i] * P[i];
00211 
00212       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00213         P[i] = (probability_sum > 0) ? weights[i] * P[i] / probability_sum : 0.f;
00214     }
00215 
00216     best_class = 0;
00217     float best_p = P[best_class];
00218     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00219       if (P[i] > best_p)
00220       {
00221         best_p = P[i];
00222         best_class = i;
00223       }
00224   }
00225   else
00226     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00227       children[i]->reestimate_probabilities_recursive(weights);
00228 }
00229 
00230 void image_classification_node::restore_occurances_recursive(float * weights)
00231 {
00232   if (is_leaf())
00233   {    
00234     if (weights == 0)
00235     {
00236       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00237         P[i] = P[i] * probability_sum;
00238     }
00239     else
00240     {
00241       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00242         P[i] = (weights[i] > 0) ? probability_sum * P[i] / weights[i] : 0.f;
00243     }
00244   }
00245   else
00246     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00247       children[i]->restore_occurances_recursive(weights);
00248 }
00249 
00250 void image_classification_node::reset_class_occurances_recursive(int class_index)
00251 {
00252   if (is_leaf())
00253     P[class_index] = 0;
00254   else
00255     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00256       children[i]->reset_class_occurances_recursive(class_index);
00257 }
00258 
00259 void image_classification_node::save_probability_sums_recursive(std::ofstream& wfs) 
00260 {
00261   if (is_leaf())
00262     wfs << probability_sum << " ";
00263   else
00264     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00265       children[i]->save_probability_sums_recursive(wfs);
00266 }
00267 
00268 void image_classification_node::load_probability_sums_recursive(std::ifstream& wfs) 
00269 {
00270   if (is_leaf())
00271     wfs >> probability_sum;
00272   else
00273     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00274       children[i]->load_probability_sums_recursive(wfs);
00275 }

00277 int image_classification_node::leaves_number(void)
00278 {
00279   if (is_leaf())
00280     return 1;
00281   else
00282   {
00283     int n = 0;
00284 
00285     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00286       n += children[i]->leaves_number();
00287 
00288     return n;
00289   }
00290 }
00291 
00292 int image_classification_node::node_number(void)
00293 {
00294   if (is_leaf())
00295     return 0;
00296   else 
00297   {
00298     int n = 1;
00299 
00300     for(int i = 0; i < children_number; i++)
00301       n += children[i]->node_number();
00302 
00303     return n;
00304   }
00305 }
00306 
00307 void image_classification_node::set_Dot(int image_width, int image_height)
00308 {
00309   int d;
00310 
00311   d = image_width / 2;
00312 
00313   du1 = int(d * rand_m1p1());
00314   dv1 = int(d * rand_m1p1());
00315 
00316   du2 = int(d * rand_m1p1());
00317   dv2 = int(d * rand_m1p1());
00318 
00319   int u0 = image_width / 2, v0 = image_height / 2;
00320   d1 = (v0 + dv1) * image_width + u0 + du1;
00321   d2 = (v0 + dv2) * image_width + u0 + du2;
00322 
00323   leaf = false;
00324 }
00325 
00326 void image_classification_node::set_Dot(int _du1, int _dv1, int _du2, int _dv2, int image_width, int image_height)
00327 {
00328   du1 = _du1;
00329   dv1 = _dv1;
00330   du2 = _du2;
00331   dv2 = _dv2;
00332 
00333   int u0 = image_width / 2, v0 = image_height / 2;
00334   d1 = (v0 + dv1) * image_width + u0 + du1;
00335   d2 = (v0 + dv2) * image_width + u0 + du2;
00336 
00337   leaf = false;
00338 }
00339 
00340 ostream& operator<< (ostream& o, const image_classification_node& node)
00341 {
00342   int i;
00343 
00344   if (node.is_leaf())
00345   {
00346     o << "LEAF " << node.index << " " << node.depth << endl;
00347     o << node.class_number << " classes" << endl;
00348 
00349     if (node.P != 0)
00350       for(i = 0; i < node.class_number; i++)
00351         if (node.P[i] > 0.001)
00352           o << i << " " << node.P[i] << endl;
00353 
00354     o << "-1 -1" << endl;
00355   }
00356   else
00357   {
00358     o << "NODE " << node.index << " " << node.depth << endl;
00359     o << "2dots_tau0" << endl; // Kept for compatibility with older versions
00360     o << 0 << " " << node.du1 << " " << node.dv1 << " " << node.du2 << " " << node.dv2 << endl;
00361     for(i = 0; i < node.children_number; i++)
00362       o << node.children[i]->index << " ";
00363     o << endl;
00364     for(i = 0; i < node.children_number; i++)
00365       o << *node.children[i];
00366   }
00367 
00368   return o;
00369 }
00370 
00372 int global_patch_size;
00373 
00374 istream& operator>> (istream& is, image_classification_node& node)
00375 {
00376   char dummyString[1000];
00377   char node_type[1000];
00378 
00379   is >> node_type;
00380 
00381   if (strcmp(node_type, "LEAF") == 0)
00382   {
00383     is >> node.index >> node.depth;
00384     is >> node.class_number >> dummyString ;
00385     node.P = new float[node.class_number];
00386     node.best_class = 0;
00387     float best_p = 0;
00388     for(int i = 0; i < node.class_number; i++)
00389       node.P[i] = 0;
00390 
00391     int ci;
00392     do
00393     {
00394       float p;
00395       is >> ci >> p;
00396       if (ci >= 0)
00397       {
00398         node.P[ci] = p;
00399 
00400         if (p > best_p)
00401         {
00402           best_p = p;
00403           node.best_class = ci;
00404         }
00405       }
00406     } while (ci >= 0);
00407   }
00408   else if (strcmp(node_type, "NODE") == 0)
00409   {
00410     int _scale, _du1, _dv1, _du2, _dv2;
00411 
00412     is >> node.index >> node.depth;
00413 
00414     is >> dummyString; // Always 2dots_tau0 : Kept for compatibily with older versions of garfield lib
00415 
00416     is >> _scale >> _du1 >> _dv1 >> _du2 >> _dv2;
00417     node.set_Dot(_du1, _dv1, _du2, _dv2, global_patch_size, global_patch_size);
00418 
00419     node.children_index = new int[node.children_number];
00420 
00421     for(int i = 0; i < node.children_number; i++)
00422       is >> node.children_index[i];
00423   }
00424   else
00425   {
00426     cerr << "Error while reading image_classification_node (token = " << node_type << ")." << endl;
00427     //throw exception("Error while reading image_classification_node"); //TODO A FAIRE
00428   }
00429 
00430   return is;
00431 }
